attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As all the citizen of this nation, we've right to stop any doings which does not constitute help to our life, as british.

Road pricing is a killing weapon to our financial life. How many earned enough to pay this fees. However, the public transport system is not working as it should and it'd really bad if the government do not consent to the public to stop this road pricing.

I believe the prime minister and his government has sense enough to cooperate with all the british people.
Many thanks for your withdrawal of road pricing.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
